description: Try these BBQ pulled pork buns for dinner tonight. With kaleslaw and lashings of burger sauce, this recipe is mouthwateringly good and incredibly easy to make.
keywords: Burger,Fakeaway,Quick & easy dinner,Kale,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Father's Day
name: 15-Minute Pulled Pork Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: Simply heat pulled pork smokey BBQ

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare pulled pork as per packet instructions. Pull meat apart and mix through sauce sachet.
Pull apart brioche buns into halves and spread top and bottom of each bun with 1 tsb of burger sauce.
Place pork and some of the kaleslaw into each bun. With remaining kaleslaw, mix through packet dressing and serve on the side.
